charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(5)(A) and 924(a) Illegal Alien in Possession of Firearms(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of SIXTY (60) MONTHS, with credit for time served, to run concurrent with Counts 3 and 4 of the Indictment; placed on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS, to run concurrent with Counts 3 and 4 of the Indictment; Special Assessment $100.00

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B)(i) Possession with Intent to Distribute Heroin(3)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of SIXTY (60) MONTHS, with credit for time served, to run concurrent with Counts 1 and 4 of the Indictment; placed on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS, to run concurrent with Counts 1 and 4 of the Indictment; Special Assessment $100.00

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(5)(A) and 924(a) Illegal Alien in Possession of Firearms(4)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of SIXTY (60) MONTHS, with credit for time served, to run concurrent with Counts 1 and 3 of the Indictment; placed on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS, to run concurrent with Counts 1 and 3 of the Indictment; Special Assessment $100.00

charges.charge_description: 18:922(j) and 924(a)(2); Transportation of firearm from another state or country with reasonable cause to believe firearm was stolen
